Translations.Text: Tebbwi tadist; syis taazel iman is, di tama ibaaden
Bdan p id inzikmiren ar loedra n tezdayt. Tenna: "anna$ lemmer mmute$, uqbel ayagi, ad pwappu$ akw
Issawel as d, seddaw as: "kkes a$wbel, ih, Mass im Irra i$eeo, seddaw am
Hucc, ar $uoem, loedra n tezdayt, ad am d i$li ppmeo amaynut ibwan
Ecc, ssew, ssefoee ieoi m. Ma twalav yiwen n umdan, ini as: nek, s tidep, ueame$ i Uenin, ur pmeslaye$, assa, i umdan
Toue yis ar ugdud is, tebbwi t. Nnan: "a Meryem! Ni$ tusiv d, s temsalt ihejjnen
A ultmas n Haoun, ur illi baba m d argaz ucmit, ur telli imma m d tazennant
Teswaad $uoes. Nnan: "amek ara nemmeslay i uuebyan di ddue
Inna: "nek d amdan n Oebbi. Ifka yi d Tazmamt. Irra yi d nnbi
Ioqa yi anda lli$. Iweuua yi taeallit, u zzakat, skud mazal iyi d amuddir
Ad bedde$ i yimma. Ur iyi Irri d aqehhao, ne$ d ccaqi
Tifrat felli asmi d lule$, asmi ara mmte$, asmi ara d u$ale$ d amuddir
D wagi ay d Aisa, mmi s n Meryem. D awal n tidep, i$ef cukken
Ur iuwib ara, i Oebbi, ad Isau kra n mmi S. Gedha syiS! Ma Iseyya lameo, ad as Yini kan: "ili"! Ad yili
Oebbi, s tidep, d Mass iw, d Mass nnwen. Ihi, aabdet eP. D wagi ay d abrid uwqim
Mgarraden ikabaren garasen. A tawa$it n wid ijehlen, mara walin ass abarar
Ara slen, ara walin, ass ideg ara d asen $uone£! Maca, imednas, assa, di ttelfan s uuee
Nabi ten, $ef ass n ssixia, mara iuao lameo. Nitni, di l$eflan, nitni ur uminen
Ih, d Nekwni, ara Iweoten tamurt akked wayen illan fellas. £uone£ tu$alin nnsen
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Iboahim. Ih, Neppa, illa d bab n tidep, d nnbi
Mi inna i baba s: "a baba! Acimi taabdev win ur nsell, ur nepwali, ur k ip$itin s wacemma
Ih, a baba, Nek ippunefk iyi d, si tmusni, ayen ur ak neppunefk. Ihi ddu yidi, a k nhu$ ar ubrid ilhan
A baba! Ur aabbed Cciian. Ni$ Cciian illa d amaauu i Uenin
A baba! Nek, ugade$ a k iwwet uaaqeb n Uenin, a ppiliv d ameddakwel n Cciian
Inna d: "day tugiv kecc, a Iboahim, ioebbiten iw? Ma ur tfukkev ara, war ccekk, a k oeome$! Iixxeo iyi tallit $wezzifen
Inna: "ili di tifrat. Ad ssutre$ i Mass iw, ad ak Isemmee. Neppa, s tidep, Iauzz iyi
Ad aazle$ iman iw segwen, akked wayen tepnujum, war Oebbi. Ad naaoe$ Mass iw, ahat, s unuju w, ar Mass iw, ur $webne$ ara
Mi iaazel iman is segsen akked wayen aabden, war Oebbi, Nefka yas Iseaq akked Yaaqub. Yal yiwen, Nerra t d nnbi
Nefka yasen seg ueunu nne£. Nerna yasen ccekoan umain, lfayeq
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Musa. Ih, neppa, illa d aaeovi, d amazan, d nnbi
Nessawel as d, si iieof ayeffus n udrar. Nessqeob it id, ad as Nmel
Nefka yas, seg ueunu nne£, gma s, Haoun, d nnbi
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Ismaail. Ih, neppa, illa d win ippaiafen di lemaahda s, d amazan, d nnbi
Iumeo i twacult is, taeallit, zzakat. Iouva t Mass is
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Idris. Ih, neppa, illa d bab n tidep, d nnbi
Nessuli t s amkan aalayen
D wigi i I$at Oebbi, ger lambiyya, ger tarwa n Adem, ger wid i Nebbwi akked Nue, ger tarwa n Iboahim, akked Isoail, ger wid Nenha u Nefren. Ma $oan asen issekniyen n Uenin, ad $lin knan, s imeiiawen
